title: Importing And Loading
p_load: Click on the Manage button in the top right corner, and you will see several built-in saves in the save section, which should be sufficient for basic use.
p_imp: If you need to load a file from a third party, click on the folder icon, and Vitamins will open the save directory. Then, drop the .save file in, and it will be ready to load inside the load drop-down selection.
